title: Enhancing Anomaly Detection in Multivariate Time Series with Stacked Transformer Encoders and Adaptive Positional Embeddings

abstract: Detecting anomalies in multivariate time series data is a complex task due to the challenges of effectively representing spatio-temporal features and extracting deep, intricate patterns across both time and feature dimensions. Traditional methods often …

title: PASTA: Neural Architecture Search for Anomaly Detection in Multivariate Time Series
details: P Trirat, JG Lee - IEEE Transactions on Emerging Topics in …, 2024
abstract: Time-series anomaly detection uncovers rare errors or intriguing events of interest that significantly deviate from normal patterns. In order to precisely detect anomalies, a detector needs to capture intricate underlying temporal dynamics of a time series …
